io.github.flowersinthesand.wes

Class AbstractServerHttpExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.flowersinthesand.wes.AbstractServerHttpExchange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerHttpExchange, Wrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtmosphereServerHttpExchange, PlayServerHttpExchange, VertxServerHttpExchange

    public abstract class AbstractServerHttpExchange
extends Object
implements ServerHttpExchange
    Abstract base class for ServerHttpExchange.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
